show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: The Shaky Edifice Crumbles
content:
Several scenarios that would justify an extreme melt-down of the stock market such as I’m predicting. <!--more--> Basically, all have to do with the decline of America as a preeminent superpower.
Economic, social, military… there’s something for everyone.
Janet Yellen feebly suggesting that the ‘recovery’ is ‘not yet complete’.
She truly doesn’t get it, does she?
More evidence that worldwide economies are slowing along with that of the United States.
All central banks have jumped on the bandwagon of money-printing including China, Japan and Europe.
There has been no positive effect anywhere.
We are left with a global economy that is exceedingly unstable and loaded with landmines of financial disorder.
